body:
Hey, you are correct. I've edited the code to work that will work for any ints, floats and lists added as x, and y. There is still two cases that hang though, using the tensor objects : 

tf.pow(tf.constant(5), tf.constant(-1))
tf.pow(tf.constant(5), -1)

I will add this functionality in the next few days and push the changes.
